across the Indian Ocean the temperature
shifts naturally in cycles when we have

what that scribes it's when we've got

so next to East Africa and cooler sea

rainfall and West conditions over East
Africa but this year has been different
the positive IOD in 2019 has been
extremely strong the water temperature
difference between the eastern and
western Indian Ocean was far larger than
normal
some farmers are worried this is because
